subject: Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The four players whose suspensions for alleged roles in New Orleans’ bounty program were recently vacated will meet with N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell, as he determines their new punishment.
snippet: The four players whose suspensions for alleged roles in New Orleans’ bounty program were recently vacated will meet with N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell, as he determines their new punishment.
